title: Leading and Guiding Through Music
description:
The compulsory module for second year students focuses
on the practical application of relevant knowledge and
skills previously acquired in The Profession of Music 1 & 2
while forging new collaborative skills through working as
a group.

The module covers collaborative and group music making
skills, audience engagement and innovative practices,
presentation skills and introduction to conducting through
various hands-on activities.
prerequisite: MUA1167 The Profession of Music 2 or a successful interview
